title: Healing crystal
description: Healing crystals were objects that aided in Force healing. They were sometimes given as gifts in the Padawan birthday ritual, and in 22 BBY Jedi Master Vokara Che used a healing crystal to treat fellow Master Obi-Wan Kenobi's injuries sustained in a terrorist attack. Jedi Apprentice: The Hidden Past (First mentioned) The Clone Wars: Wild Space (First appearance, simultaneous with audiobook) The Clone Wars: Wild Space audiobook Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II
